description: Manual ownership corrections for cables where upstream TeleGeography data contains known errors. Applied after TG metadata is loaded, overriding specific owner entries.

aden-djibouti.name: Aden-Djibouti
aden-djibouti.reason: TeleGeography incorrectly lists Tata Communications as owner. Verified: Aden-Djibouti is owned by Djibouti Telecom, Orange, Sparkle, and TeleYemen.

cadmos.name: CADMOS
cadmos.reason: TeleGeography incorrectly lists Tata Communications as owner. CADMOS connects Cyprus-Lebanon and is owned by A1 Telekom Austria, AT&T, Cyta, Deutsche Telekom, Lebanese MoT, Orange, Sparkle, and Syrian Telecom.
